movies.title: Forgive Us Our Debts
movies.plot: Through examples and parables, Jesus leads Peter to learn the power of forgiveness and how to control his anger at those who do him wrong. Through Peter's experience, we learn the lesson of forgiveness. As Peter looks over the day's excellent catch of fish, two demanding tax collectors come up to his boat. Mocking Peter's faith in Christ, they tell Peter they will return the next day to collect their tax for the temple. Jesus tells the angry Peter to forgive the tax collectors and to go to the sea and cast in his line. There, as Jesus foretold, Peter catches a fish. In the mouth of the fish is the money to pay the tax. But Peter is still angry and pays the tax with bitterness in his heart. Peter asks Jesus,"How many times do I forgive a man who has done me wrong?" Jesus tells Peter that he must forgive everyone not just once, or seven times, but "seven times seventy times." Jesus relates the parable of the foolish and proud Hazor who owes a large debt to the King. Unable to pay the ...

biography.bio: John Nicolaysen is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987), The Joseph Smith Story (1988) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: John Nicolaysen

biography.bio: Jonathan Best was born in 1977 in Salt Lake City, Utah, USA. He is an actor, known for Silent Night, Deadly Night (1984), The Legend of Wolf Mountain (1992) and Just Like Dad (1995).
biography.name: Jonathan Best

biography.bio: Glen Slight is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Glen Slight

biography.bio: Ray Porter is an actor and casting director, known for Almost Famous (2000), Argo (2012) and The Runaways (2010).
biography.name: Ray Porter

biography.bio: Craig L. Steiner is an assistant director and producer, known for High School Musical 3: Senior Year (2008), Daddy Day Camp (2007) and Wish Upon a Star (1996).
biography.name: Craig L. Steiner

biography.bio: Paul O'Connor is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), Animated Hero Classics (1991) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Paul O'Connor

biography.bio: Daniel A. Keeler is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and The Joseph Smith Story (1988).
biography.name: Daniel A. Keeler

biography.bio: Joe Lynch is an actor, known for Animated Hero Classics (1991), The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Joe Lynch

biography.bio: Phil Hubbard is an actor, known for Animated Stories from the Bible (1987), The Animated Book of Mormon (1987) and Animated Hero Classics (1991).
biography.name: Phil Hubbard

biography.bio: Gretchen Rumbaugh is an actress, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987).
biography.name: Gretchen Rumbaugh

biography.bio: Matthew Best was born in June 1980 in Salt Lake City, Utah, USA. He is an actor, known for The Paper Brigade (1996), Beyond Suspicion (1993) and Animated Stories from the Bible (1987).
biography.name: Matthew Best

biography.bio: James March is an actor, known for Animated Hero Classics (1991), Game On (1995) and The Animated Book of Mormon (1987).
biography.name: James March

biography.bio: Ivan Crosland was born on August 29, 1936. He was an actor, known for Animated Stories from the New Testament (1987), The ButterCream Gang (1992) and Brigham City (2001). He died on March 26, 2015 in Provo, Utah, USA.
biography.name: Ivan Crosland
